cgcloud__Transaction_Log__c.name: cgcloud__Transaction_Log__c
cgcloud__Transaction_Log__c.description: This object contains all transaction log messages that are related to CG.

cgcloud__Details__c.description: Stores the details of log entries in .json format.

cgcloud__Duration__c.description: Duration of the call (it's the duration of the outermost trace).

cgcloud__Entry_Time__c.description: Timestamp when the record was added to the log.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Sales organization to which the transaction log belongs.

cgcloud__Source_Type__c.description: Source from which the class made the call.

cgcloud__Transaction_Id__c.description: Transaction under which the message was logged.

cgcloud__User__c.description: User under which the transaction log entry was created
